column4: Can anyone explain how to get this going? http://www.kde-apps.org/content/show.php/Snippits?content=52197
Can anyone explain how to get setup with Snippit?  The App page is here: http://www.kde-apps.org/content/show.php/Snippits?content=52197
Can anyone explain how to run a ruby script?  ./scriptname doesn't seem to do anything
scripts must be +x and have the #!/whatever/ruby at the top to be executed in that manner
